data: Indefatigable topers, and you, thrice precious martyrs of the smock, give me leave to put a serious question to your worships while you are idly striking your codpieces, and I myself not much better employed.
Rabelais, François, 1490?-1553?; Doré, Gustave, 1832-1883 [Illustrator]; Motteux, Peter Anthony, 1660-1718 [Translator]; Urquhart, Thomas, Sir, 1611-1660 [Translator]
